messages.text:
Hello adg@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/leveldb-go/

LGTM

On Sun, Dec 11, 2011 at 6:23 PM,  <nigeltao@golang.org> wrote:
> Reviewers: adg,
>
> Message:
> Hello adg@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://code.google.com/p/leveldb-go/
>
>
> Description:
> leveldb: A+C: Christoph Hack (individual CLA).
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/5479068/
>
> Affected files:
>  M AUTHORS
>  M CONTRIBUTORS
>
>
> Index: AUTHORS
> ===================================================================
> --- a/AUTHORS
> +++ b/AUTHORS
> @@ -8,4 +8,5 @@
>
>  # Please keep the list sorted.
>
> +Christoph Hack <christoph@tux21b.org>
>  Google Inc.
> Index: CONTRIBUTORS
> ===================================================================
> --- a/CONTRIBUTORS
> +++ b/CONTRIBUTORS
> @@ -27,4 +27,5 @@
>  # Please keep the list sorted.
>
>  Brad Fitzpatrick <bradfitz@golang.org>
> +Christoph Hack <christoph@tux21b.org>
>  Nigel Tao <nigeltao@golang.org>
>
>
